questions.question: What is the time complexity of binary search in a sorted array?
What is the primary purpose of the DNS (Domain Name System)?
questions.answer: Translating domain names into IP addresses

questions.question: Which OOP principle hides internal object details and exposes only necessary interfaces?
Which sorting algorithm has the best average-case time complexity among these?
In relational databases, what uniquely identifies a record in a table?
What does ACID stand for in the context of database transactions?
What is a deadlock in an operating system?
questions.answer: A process waiting indefinitely for resources held by each other

questions.question: Which memory region grows downward and is used for function call stacks?
What is polymorphism in object-oriented programming?
questions.answer: Using a single interface to represent different types

questions.question: What does TCP stand for and what is its primary purpose?
questions.answer: Transmission Control Protocol; reliable, ordered communication
